description:

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content:
Nisha, please ask this question on the solr-user mailing list. JIRA is for bug reports or improvements, not for support (see here for details of solr-user http://lucene.apache.org/solr/resources.html). If after that you have found a bug or feature enhancement, please create a JIRA ticket.

Thanks!
